summary: The life of '80's fashion designer/queer icon Leigh Bowery is explored in this documentary.
cast: Rachel Auburn|Lee Benjamin|Steve Blame|Bronwen Bowery|Leigh Bowery|Nicola Bowery|Tom Bowery|Boy George|Michael Bracewell|Les Child|Michael Clark|William Feaver|Sophie Fiennes|Bella Freud|Robyn Healy|Damien Hirst|David Holah|Ann Holt|Michael Kostiff|Stewart Laing|Mr. Pearl|Lorcan O'Neill|Rifat Ozbek|Al Pillay|Norman Rosenthal|Stella Stein|Stevie Stewart|Sue Tilley|Richard Torry|Donald Urquhart|Cerith Wyn Evans|Yvette|Jonathan Ross|Paula Yates
title: La leyenda de Leigh Bowery
